left, the firing became more dis- tinct. Kutiizov had stopped and was speaking to an Austrian general. Prince Andrew, who was a little behind and looking at them, turned to an adjutant to ask him for a field glass. 
"Look, look! "said this adjutant, looking not at the troops in the distance, but down the hill before him. "It's the French!" 
The two generals and the adjutant took hold of the field glass, trying to snatch it from one another. The expression on all their faces sud- denly
